thread.title_full: Robert Xie's 'sexual motive' for his murder crime revealed | Daily Mail Online

author: Freya Noble For Daily Mail Australia
title: Robert Xie's 'sexual motive' for his murder crime revealed | Daily Mail Online
text: Revealed: The REAL reason Robert Xie brutally bashed to death his five relatives - by the Sydney family's only surviving child The only surviving member of the Lin family will break her silence this weekend Brenda Lin was overseas when her parents, brothers and aunt were murdered They were bludgeoned to death in their home in North Epping, Sydney Last week her uncle Robert Xie was sentenced to life in prison for the killings Xie, 53, sexually assaulted Ms Lin before and after the brutal slaying Published: 05:24 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 05:35 GMT, 16 February 2017 12 shares
